item.title: Native Hawaiians Call for World's Largest Marine Reserve
item.description:
Native Hawaiians Call for World's Largest Marine Reserve

The Papahānaumokuākea Marine National Monument "represents a responsibility to care for the place that is our beginning," says Uncle Sol, a native Hawaiian with a special connection to this place. The 2006 designation of this highly protected ocean habitat in the northwestern Hawaiian Islands marked the beginning of a global movement that's led to the creation of more than a dozen other large-scale marine protected areas.

item.title: The most influential female surfers of all time
item.description:
The most influential female surfers of all time

The most influential female surfers of all time have played several roles in the progression of the sport. It's not only a matter of grace, but also one of ability and commitment. Mary Ann Hawkins was one of the first female surfers to show how to get waves ridden in California.

item.title: Surf Camps
item.description:
Surf Camps

Smile. Learn. Laugh. Make new friends and learn to surf! Ocean Girl Surf Camps - simply awesome! Ocean Girl Project sustainable surf and ocean camps introduces girls to surfing and other ocean activities. We aim to broaden their experiences in a positive healthy non-competitive activity that builds confidence and self esteem.

item.title: Health Benefits of the Beach and Sea Water to Skin and Hair
item.description:
Health Benefits of the Beach and Sea Water to Skin and Hair

We all love relaxing on the beach, but did you know that the beach provides countless health benefits, as well? Simply by throwing on a swim suit and driving to the shore, you can help improve your acne, skin smoothness, dandruff, brain strength, and more.

item.title: Riding Waves to A Happier Healthier Life
item.description:
Riding Waves to A Happier Healthier Life

Dan Queiroz Editors Note: This is a guest post from Srinivas Rao ofThe Skool of Life... A little over a year ago, I started a spiritual and emotional journey that I now realize will last a lifetime. For many this journey is one that will forever change who they are and the journey isn't something they do, it's who they are.

item.title: Scientists Froth on Surf Stoke
item.description:
Scientists Froth on Surf Stoke

We all surf for different reasons - for health and fitness, adventure, experience, or just to be out in the ocean. Whatever our motivation, every surfer knows the feeling of surf stoke.

item.title: A Crocheted Wearable Mermaid Tail Towel That Cleverly Transforms Into Its Own Transport Bag
item.description:
A Crocheted Wearable Mermaid Tail Towel That Cleverly Transforms Into Its Own Transport Bag

Canadian crocheter MJ of MJ's Off the Hook Designs has created an adorable line of wearable mermaid tail towels that very cleverly button up and neatly transform into their own carry bags, either as a backpack or a handled arm bag. The pattern for this unique towel is also available for purchase.

item.title: Hope Spots: An Actionable Plan to Save the Ocean
item.description:
Hope Spots: An Actionable Plan to Save the Ocean

The immense problems facing the ocean often leave us feeling powerless. But what if there was a concrete, actionable strategy to nurse the ocean back to health? Dr. Sylvia Earle argues that there is.
